1.title: Reaps

episode of.title: Roxsy Tyler's Carnival of Horrors (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: The Carnival of Horrors is back with a brand-new format-- hosting short, independent horror films! Roxsy is a bit overwhelmed by her new landlord, Luigi who has transformed the place into an actual, working Carnival. Johnnie 13 and Dr. Villhelm have disappeared leaving Roxsy Tyler with her newest employee, a blood-hungry carnie named Count Chuckula. But a successful, working carnival has it's price. It's time to pay the rent and Luigi is hungry for souls! Roxsy and Count Chuckula host Jason Liquori's short horror comedy, REAPS: Central Florida Patrol.

2.title: Charlotte Digs

episode of.title: Roxsy Tyler's Carnival of Horrors (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: Count Chuckula kidnaps actress Aimee Cassada for Roxsy to interview about her upcoming new film, "Dig". While Roxsy goes off on a tangent about "being pretty" the carnies host Barry Meyer's short film "Charlotte".

3.title: Flesheaters!

episode of.title: Roxsy Tyler's Carnival of Horrors (TV Series 2010– )

3.plot: Roxsy Tyler and Count Chuckula have a heart to heart about love & zombies as they host "Flesheaters: A Love Story". Roxsy also gets to speak with the director and leading actress of the film.

4.title: The Prowler

episode of.title: Roxsy Tyler's Carnival of Horrors (TV Series 2010– )

4.plot: A prowler is running a muck a Roxsy Tyler's Carnival! Roxsy and Chuckula arm themselves as they host a short horror film from Australia entitled "Alistair".

5.title: Zombie Nom Noms

episode of.title: Roxsy Tyler's Carnival of Horrors (TV Series 2010– )

5.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: A Zombie Vampire?

episode of.title: Roxsy Tyler's Carnival of Horrors (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: In this debut episode of Roxsy Tyler's Carnival of Horrors we meet the "boss lady" Roxsy Tyler and her not-so-helpful right-hand man, Johnnie 13 along with clowns Bobo and Boobie. Roxsy and her carnies run into a problem when a "zombie-vampire" with an identity crisis shows up without buying a ticket!

2.title: Bobo's Bluebeard

episode of.title: Roxsy Tyler's Carnival of Horrors (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: Written as a touching tribute to 1944's film "Bluebeard" starring John Carradine there appears to be a serial strangler on the loose at the carnival grounds. In fact, the victims can only describe the strangler as a "pair of hands". Will these hands manage to keep to themselves or are they merely a weapon of choice for a disgruntled carnival employee?

3.title: Booley Family Fun Night

episode of.title: Roxsy Tyler's Carnival of Horrors (TV Series 2010– )

3.plot: Roxsy Tyler and Johnnie 13 take a break from their new and almost normal format to host the behind of the scenes of 2010 Independent Potent Media Thriller "Booley". Join Roxsy Tyler and Johnnie 13 as they host exclusive cast interviews and insight into the making of the film. Oh, and where did the clowns go? This episode is now a bonus feature on Brain Damage Entertainment's release of "Booley" on DVD.

4.title: Where's Boobie?

episode of.title: Roxsy Tyler's Carnival of Horrors (TV Series 2010– )

4.plot: Where's Boobie? That's the big question! As the lights mysteriously turn off they turn on again to reveal Boobie the Clown is missing. As Roxsy and her carnies fight over the "who done it" Boobie has actually gone shopping with her new friend "Charlene" a man-eater with a very deep voice.

5.title: Halloween Special

episode of.title: Roxsy Tyler's Carnival of Horrors (TV Series 2010– )

5.plot: Filmed on location at The Valley Of Fear Original Haunted Hayrides and Styer's Orchards in Bucks County, PA Johnnie 13 takes you and Roxsy Tyler on a daylight tour of one of PA's most famous haunted attractions! Meanwhile, the dynamic duo of dumb go trick or treating, summon Vincent Price, and have a run-in with a Pumpkin Monster! Happy Halloween!

6.title: Roxsy 13

episode of.title: Roxsy Tyler's Carnival of Horrors (TV Series 2010– )

6.plot: Why does Johnnie 13 kiss every girl that looks like Roxsy? We rather not know but for some reason there's been a lot of Roxsy look -a- likes recently! Johnnie 13 is banished from the carnival when Roxsy Tyler realizes the sudden appearance of a Mad Scientist might be the cause of Roxsy imposters reeking havoc in the city. The mad scientist takes it way too far when he combines Roxsy's DNA with Johnnie's DNA and creates Roxsy 13!

1.title: Valentines and Vampires

episode of.title: Roxsy Tyler's Carnival of Horrors (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: Roxsy Tyler puts Johnnie 13 on ticket duty for her new Freakshow attraction while Johnnie decides it would be a good idea to sign Roxsy up for an online dating service for Valentine's Day.

2.title: The Monsters of Horrorhound

episode of.title: Roxsy Tyler's Carnival of Horrors (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: Roxsy Tyler and Mr. Potent leave town to join their fellow horror hosts at Horrorhound Weekend in Indianapolis. Johnnie 13 decides to throw a party while Roxsy's gone. Enjoy a front row seat to the madness of Horrorhound in Indianapolis, IN which includes a Horror Host Tribute to The Marx Brothers!

3.title: Making Monsters

episode of.title: Roxsy Tyler's Carnival of Horrors (TV Series 2010– )

3.plot: Dr. Villhelm, the Mad Scientist decides to not only take over the Carnival of Horrors but attempts to give it a upgrade as he holds Roxsy Tyler and Johnnie 13 hostage.

4.title: Fright Night Cinema Presents

episode of.title: Roxsy Tyler's Carnival of Horrors (TV Series 2010– )

4.plot: Count Victor Von Scary of Fright Night Cinema gets kicked out of his castle by Kimera and Akuma Minion. Victor decides to shack up at the Carnival of Horrors. Victor appears shortly after Dr. Villhelm and Roxsy have put the "man of fire" out and hires the oblivious Victor Von Scary to dispose of the body.

5.title: Carnival of Christmas

episode of.title: Roxsy Tyler's Carnival of Horrors (TV Series 2010– )

5.plot: Sing songs and celebrate the holidays with the Carnival of Horrors. Mr. Potent awakens Roxsy Tyler and her friends from a coma they've been in since Halloween. Not only are they furious they missed Thanksgiving but they also find out the carnival has be foreclosed by the bank! Roxsy then in her best efforts try to make the money owed by hiring a hobo to be her Santa Claus for a "Christmas Carnival". Aside from the money problems, these horror hosts now need to figure out what Christmas actually is!

6.title: Happy Heart Day Massacre

episode of.title: Roxsy Tyler's Carnival of Horrors (TV Series 2010– )

6.plot: A mysterious trouble maker, Saint Valentino Geodeevil, shows up just in time for Valentine's Day at the Carnival of Horrors. Though the carnies could just as well get along with the ancient anti-love demon... the demon himself turns some of the gals into heart-eating zombies!

7.title: What You Wish For

episode of.title: Roxsy Tyler's Carnival of Horrors (TV Series 2010– )

7.plot: Roxsy Tyler and her gang host Christian Grillo's short film "The Wish" while Roxsy and Johnnie argue about zombies.

8.title: Dereks from Space

episode of.title: Roxsy Tyler's Carnival of Horrors (TV Series 2010– )

8.plot: A mysterious ship crash lands into the Carnival of Horrors, leaving Roxsy Tyler furious.
